General.Name: Izoblok
General.Description: IZOBLOK S.A. provides expanded polypropylene (EPP) components to the automotive industry worldwide. Its EPP products used in the automotive, logistics, construction, HVAC, sports gear, household appliances, and other industries. The company also offers product and tool development, design, prototyping, moulding, and CNC machining services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Chorzów, Poland. IZOBLOK S.A. is a subsidiary of BEWi ASA.
